The "real" constructor of this component. It will recursively try to instantiate and configure all the components passed in its context.

replaceZoneFromDescription

public DNSZone replaceZoneFromDescription(org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription cd)
                                   throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException
Constructs from description and replaces a new zone as child of this top level component. If it is not present it is just added. We gave it an attribute equal to its name, and if it is a "default" (reverse) zone, we also bound it with the DEFAULT_ZONE or DEFAULT_REVERSE_ZONE attributes.

Parameters:
cd - A component description for the zone data object.
Returns:
The old zone with the same name or null.
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException - if an error occurs while deploying zone.

replaceZone

public DNSZone replaceZone(DNSZone zone)
Replaces a new zone object as child of this top level component. If it is not present it is just added. We gave it an attribute equal to its name, and if it is a "default" (reverse) zone, we also bound it with the DEFAULT_ZONE or DEFAULT_REVERSE_ZONE attributes.

Specified by:
replaceZone in interface DNSView
Parameters:
zone - A zone data object that replaces/adds.
Returns:
The old zone with the same name or null.
